name: 2 Pawns, 1 Rope
description:
Survive the gun volleys and protect the rope connecting the 2 pawns. Let's see how long you'll last.

Use [WASD] to control the blue pawn and [IJKL] to control the orange one.

Game made by Blood_Jackal23

Music made by KFM

KFM YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCckGoy7RHttfiyChZLP5N8w
